name: UnderGrowth (burnt_toasty)
description:
After accidentally breaking a magical crystal, the player is shrunk down to the size of an ant. From here they must adventure through different garden environments to search for the lost shards of the crystal before its too late!

Overcome many obstacles and avoid all kinds of garden themed enemies to find the lost shards and return to your normal size!

Look out and don't get lost in the Undergrowth...

Features

  • Three unique environments to explore
  • A range of garden themed enemies and obstacles to avoid!
  • Time pressure
  • Dark pixel art style
  • Moving platforms, calculated jumps and more!

Bio

Hi I’m Ella. I’m an upcoming artist and game developer. I aim to create unique art and environments for people to explore. I developed this game as my first game project at Media Design School, I hope you enjoy it! :)
